testcase.name: test_user_register_success

failure.message: AssertionError: 期望注册成功码为1，实际为0 assert 0 == 1

testcase.failure: testscase\test_register.py:36: in test_user_register_success assert response_json["code"] == 1, f"期望注册成功码为1，实际为{response_json['code']}" E AssertionError: 期望注册成功码为1，实际为0 E assert 0 == 1
